altername_name: Puzzle Series Vol. 2: Illust Logic + Colorful Logic
name: Puzzle Series Vol. 2: Illustlogic + Colorful Logic
overview: The game "Illustlogic + Colorful logic", which released for Nintendo DS, is redesigned for the Wii! It includes all 600 puzzles by category, which is simple but can be enjoyed by anyone from beginner to advanced. In "Challenge Mode", items are used to challenge high scores by solving puzzles one after another within the time limit. In "Panel mode", a big beautiful illustration is completed by combining multiple pieces.
